data.text: Dòun zunu, mina yeema nà-kala gooiti ma,
Mazɔlɔɔ ta ta ʋili ɗa-voloi liegɔiti su, ta è-zii ma ɠonagiti,
Mina ʋala wooɠɛɠiladai ma, ta gaamai,
Naazu, ɗa zaalai zɔlɔɔ GALA ta nuɓusɛiti zea,
Ɠaliva Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ma ga è-yiimaʋɛ pɛ,
Ziimai ɠaiziɛ è-ɠɛɛ vaiti kpein su,
Mina ɓɔɠɔ zeɠe ga ɠima nu,
Toɠa ɠɛ ga kɛdɛyai è-ɓusɛi ʋɛ,
Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI lɛbi ga è-zɔlɔɔ gani ʋagɔiti,
Naazu, ɗa-molo ɠotaiti daa ɠa ve gola,
Dòun zunu, mina ɠɛlɛ Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ná-maaɠoloi ʋa,
Mazɔlɔɔ nii Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI nɛai ʋɛ, naa ɠa a ɗa zelii lo ma,
Undaanɛ nu ɠa ga naama zunui, nii é ɠigi zɔlɔɔgai,
Mazɔlɔɔ kulanumai é sɔlɔɔsu, naa vizɔgɛ walii nɔnɔi ʋa,
Fizɔgɛ é leʋe kɔtu zɔngɔ ɓaagi pɛ ba,
Sii zuɠoozai ɠa ɠimalai yeezai ɠa,
Peleiti é nu ʋilɛsu ti ʋa, naati pagɛ,
Toɠa ga zɛnvu wului naati bɛ, niiti ti sosu kpe,
Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ná-ɠimalai ɠa é zooi ɓɛtɛni la,
Ná-ɠimalai ʋɔ, zou wu ɗɛiti kulaʋɛ, ti la zooi ma,
Dòun zunu, ɠili keleɠelegi ʋa, ta kidafaawui,
Mazɔlɔɔ ta ɠɛ ga zɛnvu ʋagɔi è ya,
Naazu, è ɠisu ɠa ɠala, è ɗa li ga lii ʋele,
Ni ɗa laana, maaɠili la ɠɛa è ma,
È la luaa kulafiliba vaaɓa ba,
Mazɔlɔɔ Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ɠa ɠɛ ga ɗa-ɠitogi,
Siɛnɔpɛ su zobogi è ʋɛ la,
Mina ɠɛ è-zeiɲɔɠɔi ma:
Mina faa ɲɔu ɓɛtɛ ɠisu, è-zeiɲɔɠɔi laalɔɠɔma,
Mina nu nɔpɛ sakpe wafuun,
Mina ɠaazuɠula toosu nuiti ba,
Mazɔlɔɔ yaava nuiti maayoseɠeʋɛ Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ʋɛ,
Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ɠa ɗa nu ɲɔi ná-pɛlɛyeɠei voovo,
Toɠa ɗa ɲɛɛɠula ɲɛɛɠulasu nuiti su,
Lɛbiyai ɠa a ɠɛ ga ɠima nuiti tɔnɔi,
